answers.answer: I can understand a sticky clear discharge prior to urination and  following sexual excitement that does not result in orgasm as the periurethral glands do secrete fluid that appears prior to orgasm. After urinating, I am at a loss to explain this as I would expect the urine to have dissolved this fluid. If you are a diabetic with poor sugar control, maybe you have a lot of glucose in your urine and that last drop is really urine not secretion.S.A.Liroff, M.D.
thank you Dr. I'll get myself tested for diabetes and inform you...but if its urine what do u recommend i should do?

question: Am a male -26 yrs...from past year as in December i noticed after urination a drop or two of transparent fluid is discharged which is sticky...my urine flow is normal....i got my urine test done but it came out normal...i have never had sex but i do often masturbate....so can you please help in the diagnosis and treatment cause i have visited afew doctors but to no avail...can this be prostatitis ?
title: discharge after urination..
